message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $175. It's in great condition and worth every penny. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but $175 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $120 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit to $160.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let's make this happen!
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $160 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $145.
